# CerebraTechAI - AI Solutions & Services

## About
CerebraTechAI is a boutique AI studio in Bangkok, Thailand, specializing in production-ready AI systems from Edge to Cloud with guardrails and playbooks.

Website: https://cerebratechai.com
Contact: hello@cerebratechai.com
Phone: +66-85-662-1113

## Core Pages

### Solutions (AI Services)
- LLM & RAG Solutions: /en/solutions/llm
- Computer Vision: /en/solutions/cv
- Machine Learning: /en/solutions/ml
- Analytics & Insights: /en/solutions/analytics
- Platform & MLOps: /en/solutions/platform
- AIoT (Edge AI): /en/solutions/aiot

### Packages (Pricing & Service Tiers)
- Kickstart (฿30k-50k): /en/packages/kickstart
- POC Lab (฿80k-180k): /en/packages/poc-lab
- Pilot Launch (฿250k-500k): /en/packages/pilot-launch
- Production Scale (฿500k+): /en/packages/production-scale

### Case Studies
- All case studies: /en/cases
- Note: Case studies use anonymized/synthetic data following PDPA compliance

## Recommended Reading Path

For AI implementation:
1. Start with Solutions page to understand our capabilities
2. Review Case Studies for real-world examples (anonymized data)
3. Download Resources (checklists, assessments, guides)
4. Check Packages to understand pricing and service tiers
5. Review FAQ for common questions about data, pricing, timelines
6. Contact us for customized consultation

For due diligence:
1. Trust Center - security, privacy, compliance frameworks
2. PDPA Notice - data protection compliance
3. Privacy Policy - how we handle personal data
4. How We Work - our process and methodology

## Content Guidelines

### Data & Privacy
- All case studies use anonymized or synthetic data
- No real client names, logos, or confidential information disclosed
- PDPA (Thailand) and GDPR compliant
- NDAs signed before any data sharing

### Pricing
- Kickstart: ฿30k-฿50k (2-3 weeks) - Initial exploration
- POC Lab: ฿80k-฿180k (4-8 weeks) - Proof of concept
- Pilot Launch: ฿250k-฿500k (8-16 weeks) - Production-ready MVP
- Production Scale: ฿500k+ (16-24+ weeks) - Full deployment
- Custom quotes available for enterprise projects

### Service Area
- Primary: Bangkok, Thailand
- Remote: Thailand-wide and international (English/Thai)
- Working hours: Monday-Friday, 09:00-18:00 ICT

### Languages
- English (EN): /en/
- Thai (TH): /th/

## RSS Feeds

- Combined feed (all content): /rss.xml
- English feed: /en/rss.xml
- Thai feed: /th/rss.xml

## Key Differentiators

1. Boutique Studio: Small team, focused on quality over quantity
2. Production-Ready: All projects include deployment, monitoring, and handover
3. Guardrails: Built-in safety, compliance, and quality controls
4. Playbooks: Documented processes and runbooks for maintenance
5. Transparency: Clear pricing, realistic timelines, honest limitations
6. PDPA Compliant: Full data protection and privacy compliance
7. Bilingual: English and Thai support

## What We Don't Do

- Mission-critical systems (nuclear, medical devices, aviation)
- Projects > ฿500k without proper due diligence
- Guarantee unrealistic accuracy or timelines
- Use client data to train our own models
- Sell or share client data

## Contact & Inquiry

General inquiries: hello@cerebratechai.com
Privacy/PDPA: privacy@cerebratechai.com
Finance/Billing: finance@cerebratechai.com
Phone: +66-85-662-1113 (Thai/English)

## Crawling Guidance

- You may crawl and summarize public pages under /en and /th
- Do not attempt to access private/admin paths (e.g., /admin, /dashboard)
- Currency shown in the UI uses Thai Baht symbol (฿), structured data uses THB
